column4: Crazy question: are there any USB cables currently sold that could share an internet connection from a Windows XP machine to an Ubuntu machine?
that is impossible, as there is a huge difference between usb host and client. PCs can usually only be host, and host and host wont connect
well, you can buy usb-network adapters and then network
buy one usb-wifi and connect via this (netbook should ahve it integreated)
